archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0498
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to purchase a premier Visual Voicemail service, so that I can have a better voicemail experience.

properties.value: Assumption: just an add-on service that is charged for by BSS, configuration outside of Comarch? Expectation is that the customer could record the message, browse through recordings via the mobile app. Jared to provide some more details about the functionality and Comarch to check internally.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
